results.content:
Excellent course!!

Harshit is very knowledgeable about Full-Stack Web development and is able to present web development in a way that is easily understandable. 

A topic is introduced and then followed by step-by-step demonstrations to code along with .

I am confident in my web development skills gained from the course.

It is a single course on multiple web technologies- html, css, javascript, php, sql, and perl.

Good of passionate learners.

results.content:
I work as a Java programming teacher at my Institute, i was fascinated to learn Website development from starting but not going just theoratically but wanted to learn with some real stuff. This course prooved to be my guide, and i asked a lot of question to intructor while learning, he always replied within 24 hours.

Sometimes i had doubts while watching lectures, that i cleared by asking him.
